com.nexmo.sdk.core.request

Class RequestSigning

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexmo.sdk.core.request.RequestSigning

  • public class RequestSigning
extends java.lang.Object
    Signing mechanism used for all the SDK service requests.
    • Attach all request parameters together in a string.
    • Append the shared_secret and timestamp and apply an MD5 algorithm to compute the signature.
    • The signature together with the timestamp will be appended to the request parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • constructSignatureForRequestParameters

        public static java.lang.String constructSignatureForRequestParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                                                      java.lang.String secretKey)
        Signing mechanism used for all the SDK service requests.

        Sign a set of request parameters, generating additional parameters to represent the timestamp and generated signature. Uses the supplied pre-shared secret key to generate the signature.

        Parameters:
        params - Map containing name value pair parameters to be submitted as part of the url.
        secretKey - the pre-shared secret key held by the merchant.
        Returns:
        String the fully constructed url complete with signature.

      • verifyRequestSignature

        public static boolean verifyRequestSignature(java.lang.String timestamp,
                             Response response,
                             java.lang.String secretKey)
